tool_description: Parses and processes incoming HTTP requests, extracting headers, body, query parameters, and path variables for API endpoints.

supported_content_types.description: Supported content types for request parsing

error_messages: Unsupported content type: Request content type not in supported list
Request too large: Request exceeds maximum allowed size
Malformed request: Unable to parse request body or headers
Empty content types: Provide at least one supported content type
usage: Configure supported_content_types array and optionally set max_request_size. The tool will handle parsing of various HTTP request formats.
